userInput.text: I'd prefer to use my American Express when putting funds into my account.
Good afternoon. I made a transfer from my UK bank account. I haven't seen anything on the account in the pass few hours. Please check the account to make sure everything is fine.
Are there any charges for top ups?
Can an American resident apply to get a card?
Why is my last transfer pending?
How do I go about transferring money using my credit card?
I would like to close my account, as I'm not happy.
What process should I use to transfer money into my account?
How can I reset my passcode?
